official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to authorize the appropriation of funds for fiscal years 1982, 1983, and 1984, for the administration of such Act by the Federal Communications Commission.

summary.text: Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to authorize appropriations for the administration of such Act by the Federal Communications Commission for fiscal years 1982, 1983, and 1984.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to authorize the appropriation of funds for fiscal years 1982, 1983, and 1984, for the administration of such Act by the Federal Communications Commission.
